projects.title: Lock And Key
projects.description: Lock&Key is a self-hosted, self-managed, open-source password manager. It provides everything you need to store and manage your accounts securely!
projects.author: Luddekn
projects.underEmbed: Lock & Key is a password manager I created as my final exam project for university. It's created using Python and MySQL.
projects.readmore: Read more by clicking the embed under!

projects.title: LEnum
projects.author: Luddekn
projects.underEmbed: LEnum is a interactive Linux enumerator I created for fun during the summer of 2024. It's not doing anything insane, it just provides the user with an interactive terminal to enumerate a Linux machine. It's created using Shell scripting.
projects.readmore: Read more by clicking the embed under!
